attributes.action: Change the law so those aged 75 years and over do not need a TV Licence
attributes.additional_details: Senior citizens have forgone the winter heating grant and this will aid them.
attributes.background: Return to free TV Licence for those aged 75 years and over

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund free TV licences for all pensioners
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700117
